text: 8.24: Mt 8.25; Mk 4.38Mbe tuga mbatɨga ndiav, mba Zisas phorga rui gumgi, mbe vov Zisasan vhurav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Guman Rum, Guman Rum, nza mbɨ thov vhɨzɨr zav mbui.” Mbe maaŋ ana nzuaim, ana khavgiap, mbaram mba bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ gum mbɨ phuri ruma mbuav, mani ga vhegim, mani fhura thuga vugi. Mani thuga vugim, mba mbɨ fhura mbɨrira vugap rɨgap ki.
